pages.text: $(li)The Clock Block visually displays the current in-game time.$(br)$(li)Right clicking on it will display the current time in digital format.

$(li)A Comparator can be used to receive a signal from 0 to 15 that is proporcional to the in-game time which is from 0 to 24.$(br)$(li)An Observer will detect a block update each time an in-game hour passes.
